attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2008-0368

Date: 2008-02-20

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que des lettres patentes revêtues du grand sceau du Canada soient émises nommant l’honorable Pierre Blais, juge de la Cour fédérale, à titre de juge de la Cour d'appel fédérale, et membre de droit de la Cour fédérale.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that letters patent under the Great Seal of Canada be issued appointing the Honourable Pierre Blais, a Judge of the Federal Court, to be a Judge of the Federal Court of Appeal, and a member ex officio of the Federal Court.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that letters patent under the Great Seal of Canada be issued appointing the Honourable Pierre Blais, a Judge of the Federal Court, to be a Judge of the Federal Court of Appeal, and a member ex officio of the Federal Court.
